views.markdown: If you need help with "Scooter Companion", you can contact KToffel & Schorlescooter, the developer, via e-mail.
You can also contact KToffel & Schorlescooter using the following sites:
Codey Moore is the maintainer of the package "Scooter Companion". Please contact them via email for any questions on this version of the package.
If you found a mistake in the depiction or cannot download the package, you can reach out to the maintainer of the "Scooter Companion" repo, Scooter Companion.
